description: Surrogate primary key for this record; uniquely identifies a localized UI form/resource entry.
Foreign key to the language catalog identifying the language of this recordâ€™s captions/labels.
Logical identifier of the application form or UI component this localization entry pertains to.
User-visible caption or title for the form/component in the specified language.
Code indicating the type/class of UI resource (e.g., form, dialog, report); likely from a lookup; confirm with SME.
Foreign key to the project or module that owns this localized resource, used for scoping and grouping.
Optional link to the underlying .resx resource entry containing strings for this form; may be null; confirm with SME.
Timestamp of the most recent change to this record, used for auditing and replication.
